title: Senior Software Engineer

All applications developed need unit, integrated and automated tests. Focus on fleet management solutions and worker safety applications.

recommendations.author: Tech Lead - Trimble
recommendations.text: Wilton's expertise in facial recognition and real-time processing has been invaluable to our fleet safety initiatives. His microservices architecture significantly improved our system scalability.

recommendations.text: Exceptional problem-solving skills in complex AI integration projects. Always delivers robust, well-tested solutions with excellent documentation.
